projects.title: Algorhythm
projects.description: Algorhythm is a Spotify playlist creation tool that makes finding new music easy by connecting users to AI-powered algorithms with a simple and intuitive experience.

projects.title: Alpine Music App
projects.description: The Alpine Music App is designed for DJs to live stream to their fans, display previous streams, and promote and monetize their brand.

projects.title: Battleship
projects.description: An immersive multiplayer battleship game app that allows players to strategically deploy and sink their opponents' fleets in real-time naval combat.

projects.title: Add more sections!
projects.description: The starter includes predefined sections as well as a template for new, custom sections. Moreover, you can add new projects to this section without additional coding. Photo by Kelly Sikkema on Unsplash.
